column2: Laser scanner motor does not lock.
Fixing heater harness disconnected or broken.

Paper jam. The registration sensor remains ON.
Paper jam. The paper ejection sensor remains ON.
Paper jam. Even after the registration sensor has gone OFF, the paper ejection sensor still stays OFF.
Document not detected by the document rear sensor.
50% or more faulty of white level data.
Less than 50% faulty of white level data.
A/D converter reference voltage error (at High level).
Light emission intensity error of the LED array.

Scanning error: The right-hand black reference line which is marked on the document pressure bar for scanning width setting is not detected.

CTS stays OFF or ON if the MODEM RTS is turned ON or OFF, respectively.

Microprocessor (MPU) error on the control panel PCB.
Voice message recording or playing-back not started.
